channel.title: Vb6
channel.description: Hey i just got VB6 i wont to start programing can i do most basic things with that?

item.title: Vb6
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:5, topic:103195”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=147717.msg1405157#msg1405157 date=1180634279]

You can do anything with VB you can do with any other language, as long as you don’t mind being restricted to Windows.
[/quote] I’m afraid that’s completely wrong. You are restricted from alot of important things in VB6. Barely any Object Orientation for example. I don’t believe there’s any multi-threading either. And very few operators too.

VB is actually fairly object orientated, it just dosen’t support some of the more advanced features (then again nor does Java). Of course you can multi-thread in VB, and “very few operators” dosen’t make a lot of sense.

I never said it was a good language, I said you could do anything in it that you could do in another language, on the Windows platform, which is completely true.[/quote]

Multi-Threading is actually quite easy in Visual Basic, hehe.

Read full topic

@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:4, topic:103195”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=147717.msg1404769#msg1404769 date=1180625462]
You can do anything with VB you can do with any other language, as long as you don’t mind being restricted to Windows.
[/quote] I’m afraid that’s completely wrong. You are restricted from alot of important things in VB6. Barely any Object Orientation for example. I don’t believe there’s any multi-threading either. And very few operators too.[/quote]

VB is actually fairly object orientated, it just dosen’t support some of the more advanced features (then again nor does Java). Of course you can multi-thread in VB, and “very few operators” dosen’t make a lot of sense.

I never said it was a good language, I said you could do anything in it that you could do in another language, on the Windows platform, which is completely true.

Read full topic
